name: @mszu/pixi-ssr-shim
description: A shim that allows PixiJS to be imported (but not run) in a server-side-rendering context
author: Mark Szumowski

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:typings
scripts.build:mjs: tsc --rootDir src --outDir build/mjs --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --module esnext src/*.ts && mv build/mjs/index.js dist/index.mjs
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --rootDir src --outDir build/cjs --esModuleInterop src/*.ts && mv build/cjs/index.js dist/index.js
